The ground of Christianitie composed in maner of a dialogue between Paule and Titus, contayning all the principall poyntes of our saluation in Christ. Gee, Alexander.

Printed by Robert walde-graue, and are to be sold at the signe of the Beare in Paules Church-yard, by Thomas VVoodcocke, At London : Anno Dom. 1584.
Dedication signed: Alexander Gee. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
